Package photos.group4.controller

Class SelectedAlbumSlideshowController

java.lang.Object
photos.group4.controller.SelectedAlbumSlideshowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Alerts, Logout
public class SelectedAlbumSlideshowController extends Object implements Logout, Alerts
JavaFX Controller Class to handle Album Slideshow View of Non-admin Subsystem features
